Price: $255.54 - $169.90
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:34:01 UTC – Details)


The Caséta wireless Deluxe dimmer kit with Caséta Smart Hub provides simple and personalized control of your lights, shades and temperature. Control your lights from anywhere within your home with the included Pico remote controls or from anywhere in the world using the free Lutron app. Set lights to automatically adjust with spring and fall time changes, create personalized schedules to turn on, off, or dim lights at set times to best fit your everyday routines, or control lights with your voice via Alexa and Siri. The Caséta Smart Hub also connects with other leading brands like Ring, Honeywell, Sonos, Serena shades and more. The included in-wall dimmers install easily with no neutral wire required, provide the best dimming performance for over 500 different dimmable LED bulbs, and can be controlled from anywhere within the home with the included Pico remotes. To use dimmers in a multi-location application, replace the existing switch with a Pico remote control and wall plate adapter (PICO-WBX-ADAPT, sold separately). Pico remote control takes (1) CR2032 battery, included in remote.
PEACE OF MIND: Set lights to automatically adjust with changing seasons so your family always comes back to a well-lit home; you can also enable the Smart Away feature to randomly turn your lights on and off to look like you’re home even if you’re away.
MOST CONNECTED: Caséta connects with more leading smart home devices – including Alexa, Apple HomeKit, the Google Assistant, Serena shades and Sonos – than any other smart lighting control brand
CONTROL YOUR WAY: Caséta puts the smarts in the switch so you can control your lights a variety of ways – via the free Lutron app, your voice, or from the wall. You can create personalized schedules to turn on, off, or dim lights at set times to best fit your everyday routines, or activate favorite lighting scenes with the touch of a button
RELIABLY SMART: The Caséta Smart Hub doesn’t use Wi-Fi, so you get super-fast, ultra-reliable smart lighting that works right, without slowing your Wi-Fi down with more devices
SET IT AND FORGET IT: Always keep your smart light functionality. Even when the Wi-Fi goes down, there’s no need to reset your schedules and scenes or reconnect everything when it comes back online
GET MORE, SPEND LESS: One Caséta smart switch can control many bulbs at once; make many bulbs smart, even your existing bulbs get smart control of multiple styles of dimmable LED, incandescent, and halogen bulbs
WORKS WITH EXISTING WIRING: Unlike other smart dimmer switches, Caséta works in any home, of any age, as it does not require a neutral wire



Previous page

Next page

1 Wall Control 2 App Control 3 Voice Control 4 Pico Remote Control

Previous page

  1. Smart Hub

    Unlock smart features that enhance your system.

  2. Most Compatible

    Caséta works with more smart home products than any other smart lighting brand.

  3. Scheduling

    Schedule your lights to come on at dusk and have them automatically adjust as the seasons change.

  4. Geofencing

    Set your location around your home so your lights automatically turn on as you arrive home.

  5. Smart Away

    Use Smart Away to randomly turn your lights on or off to give the illusion that you are home.

Next page

1 Smart Hub 2 Most Compatible 3 Scheduling 4 Geofencing 5 Smart Away

Create Personalized Scenes and Schedules


Good Morning

Create personalized schedules for the way you live: for example, schedule kitchen lights to turn on to a soft level every morning at 6:30 (except weekends!).


Dinner with Friends

Control multiple lights at the same time by setting a scene. Save your favorites and activate them with a single touch, so you’ll always have the right light for the moment.

Two Dimmer Starter Kit

item.content:encoded:

(as of Nov 30,2022 08:55:43 UTC – Details)



Multipurpose rotary tool – From woodworking, carpentry, car care to jewelry making and more; Not recommended for cutting, drilling, or routing.
The versatile 7760 Lite is the diyer’s go-to solution for light duty DIY and crafting projects. Includes 10 accessories to kick start your projects right out of the box.
Quick accessory changes – With the patented EZ Twist Nose Cap, accessory changes are easy and done without the need of a wrench. Collet size is 1.8”.
Variable speed – Seamlessly adjust to the ideal speed from 8,000 to 25,000 for optimal control & maneuverability
Easy battery charging – The rechargeable 4V Li-ion battery & convenient USB charger ensures that it’s ready whenever you are, Battery Size: 4-volt, Battery Amp Hours: 2Ah
Battery life indicator – LED light illuminates to notify you when the battery needs to be charged
Portable & lightweight – 360-degree soft grip material allows for comfort & precise control. Cordless design offers the freedom to take it anywhere

【Package Content】(352Pcs/26Sets) 1/2/3/4 Pin 22-16 AWG automotive super sealed waterproof electrical wire connector sets with male & female terminal and silicone rubber cable seal. 1-4 pin waterproof connector: a total of 26 sets of automotive connectors waterproof are included, which can meet most of your needs.
【High Quality of Automotive Connector】Automotive waterproof connectors are made of high quality environmental-friendly materials, with high chemical stability, electrical conductivity and oxidation resistance, waterproof, dustproof and safe. Buckle design of automotive wire connectors ensures accurate and complete insertion of the contact in the housing and prevents it from slipping out of the electrical plug connectors. Can also be easily removed when needed.
【Excellent Performance of Car Connector Kit】The automotive connector kit terminals use high-precision copper plating process to improve conductivity, easy to install under soldering and crimping, reliable safe connection, no loose, and lightweight. They are perfect automotive replacement ignition plug connectors.
【Widely Applications of Automotive Electrical Connectors】Automotive waterproof connectors are great for various wire connectors of motorcycle, truck, marine, jet ski, scooter, car, and boat etc. Believe that our automotive wire connector can give you a great help.
【Electronic Manual and Service Guarantee】Please download the operating instructions first before use. If you have any dissatisfaction with the waterproof automotive connectors or the size of the car electric connector kit, we can offer you 365 days payment refund guarantee, we guarantee a 100% return and give you a full refund. Sincerely wish you a happy shopping!

(as of Nov 30,2022 08:37:59 UTC – Details)



7 in1 Edge Trimming Squeegee: The squeegee set has 14 ends with different shapes, which fit for any edge of your car, such as headlight, Bumper, car doors handle, Car center-console. CARTINTS brand edge trimming squeegee will help you complete vinyl film wrapping in narrow corners.
4 Inches Felt Edge Squeegee: Made of soft plastic, strong enough to improve the efficiency of smoothing vinyl film. Microfiber felt edge squeegee will not leave any scratches or marks on the thin self-adhesive paper.
Vinyl Wrap Cutter And 9mm Knife Blade: The razor cutter is safe enough for you to cut off vinyl film roll because its blade is hidden inside. The retractable 9 mm knife is the best to trim the excess vinyl film or cut the size you want. Snap off blade will miantain long time best cutting performance.
Vinyl Wrap Magnets and Work Gloves: You can use the vinyl magnet tool to hold the large vinyl film paper so that you can free your hands to finish the details from smoothing to trimming.Work gloves is the key tool to prevent hands injury, or the damages of vinyl wrap paper.
Package: 7 x blue hard edge-trimming squeegee, 2x blue felt squeegee, 2 x vinyl wrap magnet holder,1 x 9mm utility knife,10 x blades,5 x squeegee felts replacement,1 x safe red cutter, 1x black work gloves

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:29:58 UTC – Details)



【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, super quiet and low vibration, so pets are not afraid to grind their nails.
【2 Adjustable Speed & 3 Ports】: 2-speed of power, strong and weak adjustable enough to support heavy grinding. 3 types of nail grinding, suitable for large, medium and small dogs and cats, you can choose the nail trimmer port according to the different sizes of pets and the hardness of the nails.
【Upgraded LED Light Dog Nail Trimmer】: DEELOKI pet nail grinder has LED light , so you can clearly see your pet’s blood line and avoid over-grinding and hurting your pet. Compared with other dog nail trimmers, this light will be more accurately illuminated.
【Portable Cordless &USB Rechargeable】: Cordless pet nail trimmers, compact ergonomic design, easy to carry and use, no matter when and where you can grind your pet’s nails. Rechargeable 4 hours can last up to 8 hours of use.

From the brand

Founded in 2015, Sealegend is focused on helping people reduce cleaning burdens, reduce safety hazards and improve the happiness.

Sealegend’s mission is to provide quality and cost-effective products, spread home cleaning concepts and a healthy lifestyle.

We have been working on dryer vent cleaning products and our products have reached a good use function. In order to meet different customer needs, we have also developed more different styles.

Why was the brand sealegend born?

As we all know, the dryers are a must-have electrical appliance in every household, but the long-term lack of cleaning of dryers is also the main cause of annual fires. Therefore, in order to solve the confusion and safety problems of daily cleaning, we began to develop convenient and efficient cleaning kit for dryers, and the Sealegend brand was born.

What makes our products different?

Every Sealegend product is carefully developed by our R&D department. Through a lot of market research, we continue to come up with ideas to solve customer problems, so as to produce suitable products.

What problem are we solving?

Save money and provide effective cleaning tools. Helps solve lots of difficult-to-clean problems.

Dryer vent cleaner kit

Vent Cleaner Kit Lint Remover

Dryer Vacuum Attachment

[New design]-Essential for Dryer Vent-Our long attachment hose attaches to your vacuum and lets you clean the deep recesses of your appliances. Perfect for your washing machine, dryer, freeze dryer machine, and more can run more efficiently. Flexible and handy hose is perfect for removing lint build-up beyond you can’t reach
[Improve Dryer Performance] The dryer that cannot be cleaned for many years accumulates a lot of dirt. The vents will become narrow or even blocked. Our dryer lint vacuum attachment can clean the vents effectively and make your equipment runs more efficiently
[Helps Prevent Fires] The dust lint is the main cause of fire in the dryer. Every year there are tens of thousands of fires caused by the failure of the dryer. So we need this dryer vent cleaner kit to keep cleaning of the dryer and prevent fires
[A Cost-Effective Cleaning Kit] Dryer Lint Cleaner kit adds years to your appliances. You will have saved more money in cleaning and maintenance costs. Not only that, but you are helping them avoid lint fires. Keep them safe and protect the performance of dryer. It is valuable for you to choose this dryer vent vacuum hose
[2 Types of Hoses can be Switched for Use] In order to adapt to different dryer vents, we provide two types of hoses. When switching use, you only need to remove the adapter and the hose connection to connect to the corresponding long hose.

***In order to adapt to different dryer vents, we provide two types of hoses.

***When switching use, you only need to remove the adapter and the hose connection and then connect to the corresponding long hose.

1. What do you get ?

One round hose with guide wire, one flat hose, and one adpater.

Paid one and you can get more kinds of way to clean your dryer easy and effectively

2. What can this Dryer Vent Vacuum Cleaner Attachment help you?

(1)This dryer vent cleaner can attached to your vacuum and reach to fit into the narrow crevice of your machine. Don’t worry about the corner you can’t clean.

(2)This attachment is a time and money saver! It makes dryer cleaning extremely fast and easy.

(3)Before this, cleaning the dryer maybe a nightmare. And you always ingnore to clean the dryer vent. Now this attachment is a time and money saver for you ! It makes dryer cleaning extremely fast and easy.

(4)If there something wrong with my filter vent in my dryer, You don’t need to buy a new filter vent and firstly just use the dryer vent Cleaner Kit to clean vent and get away from the a mess lint in bottom of filter.

Multiple Using Features

item.title: Fairy Gardens,Fairy a Garden Set with Planting Tools,Fairy House Kit for 5,6,7,8,9,10,11,12 Year Old Boys and Girls to Play and Plant,Suitable for Children as Birthday Gifts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 🌱【Create Your Own Magic Cottage】:This fairy house set lets your little one grow plants using the included soil,gardening tools.Observe the whole process of plants from sowing,germination,flowering,and fruiting,experience the fun of planting,and feel the tenacity of life in nature.You can also add your favorite plants or flowers to create your own ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:09:50 UTC – Details)



【Create Your Own Magic Cottage】:This fairy house set lets your little one grow plants using the included soil,gardening tools.Observe the whole process of plants from sowing,germination,flowering,and fruiting,experience the fun of planting,and feel the tenacity of life in nature.You can also add your favorite plants or flowers to create your own magic gardens for even more fun.
【A kids Garden Suitable for Cultivating STEM】:This flower garden toy allows your child to experience the full process of plant growth: planting,growing,flowering,fruiting.In the process, children can take a closer look at their own small garden, connect with nature through the garden set, and learn about botany and the life cycle of plants.Planting a fairy gardens is a great activity that develops planting skills, responsibility and confidence.
【Fairy Gardens Craft Kit】:The fairy house kit includes a shovel, water can, garden toy rake, pink flower pot, mushroom house, fairy tale house,table and chairs,2 soils,and instructions for the children’s plant growth kit.With these garden tools,kids can grow their own fairy house and even decorate with some pebbles,garden toys or other fun things to play in the magical fairy world you create!
【Start Growing Your Magic Cottage Magical Cottage】: Install the main body of the fairy hut following the instructions included,soak the soil in water,pour it over the upper and lower parts of the pot,place the plant in the soil with a tool.Water the plant as needed and make sure it also gets sunlight.You can play your magical gardening play set indoors or out!Watch your garden every day to see the plant sprout and grow,as well as plant your favorite flowers.
【Unique Gifts for Kids】:Magic kids garden kits for girls and boys ages 3 and up are unique gifts for little ones on birthdays,Christmas, Thanksgiving and more.Children will have fun looking after their magic garden.This toy is suitable for children over 3 years old.For safety reasons,it is recommended that parents accompany children to play together.If you have any questions about toy flower garden,please feel free to contact us.We will get back to you within 24 hours.

item.title: HOTO Precision Electric Screwdriver Set, 25 in 1 Magnetic Driver Bits Set, Rechargeable Screwdriver Tool Set, S2 Steel, Repair Tool Kit for Precision Electronics
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) HIGH-QUALITY PRECISION BITS: Come with 25 precision bits and 10 mainstream types, which can meet daily maintenance needs. All screwdriver bits are made of S2 steel with a hardness of up to 60HRC. Compare with CR-V, S2 steel has the advantages of high strength, wear resistance, and corrosion resistance. Every ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $69.99 - $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:38 UTC – Details)



HIGH-QUALITY PRECISION BITS: Come with 25 precision bits and 10 mainstream types, which can meet daily maintenance needs. All screwdriver bits are made of S2 steel with a hardness of up to 60HRC. Compare with CR-V, S2 steel has the advantages of high strength, wear resistance, and corrosion resistance. Every bit is machined with high precision to avoid damaging the screw. Specially used for precision object disassembly, such as repairing computers/tablets/game consoles/cameras/watches, etc.
ADVANCED APPEARANCE: Extremely textured aluminum alloy frosted appearance, bringing you a delicate touch. Electric screwdriver dark gray appearance design brings advanced visual experience. Aluminum shell surface treated with anodic oxidization, anti-sweat, and anti-corrosion. PC+ABS high-strength engineering plastic shell bottom, sturdy and durable. Stylish, high-end precision screwdriver set is the perfect gift.
BUILT-IN MAGNETIZER MAGNETIZATION ANY TIME: The storage box has an integrated magnetization area design, which can be magnetized at any time for the equipped bits and any screwdrivers to better absorb precision screws. The practical magnetic design aims to save time and effort. Small torque setting keeps you from over-tightening screws. HOTO useful precision screwdriver set is a decent gift for both professional and amateur.
EASY USE & PORTABLE MAGNETIC BOX: HOTO electric screwdriver with all-aluminum alloy non-slip shell, surface three-dimensional texture design, make the grip more stable and less slippery. The front end of the screwdriver has a built-in magnet, and the batch head is magnetically installed for quick replacement. One-button start design, easy to use, even users with zero experience can easily operate. TPU soft rubber material buttons, provide a comfortable feel.
TYPE-C & PORTABLE BOX: Type-C charging port, suitable for charging cables of various electronic products, enabling charging anytime, anywhere. Comes with a storage box, lightweight and compact design makes it easy to put in a bag and carry outdoors. The magnetic design makes it much easier to use and prevents the loss of the bit. Precision screwdriver built-in 350mAh lithium battery with long battery life. The battery can punch 500 screws once fully charged.

4.5
Price: $69.99 - $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:38 UTC – Details)

KCRTEK Body Repair Tools:5 Fasteners Remover Tools,10 Cable Ties and 630pcs bumper clips are used for splash shield retainers,door trim,door panel,bumper,fender,engine cover radiator shield yoke and trim panel replacement for Toyota,GM,Ford,Jeep,Honda,Acura,Bmw,Subaru,Chrysler,Nissan,Mazda and many More.It also can work on some applications like motor vehicles,furniture and electronic equipments.
Don’t worry the car clips are not suitable for your car.if your vehicle is special and cannot be used,please provide the vehicle information and And where to use it,we will replace you with a new one no charge.16 most common sizes that covers 5mm,6mm,6.2mm,6.25mm,7mm,7.8mm,8mm,9mm to 10mm Hole for replacement of broken retainers.
The Push retainer kit and plastic rivets are made of sturdy and durable and nylon material,which is strong and durable would not break easily.
5pcs Fastener romover allow you quickly and easily remove the car door panel and upholstery clips without causing damage to them and Easily access into confined areas.10pcs black nylon cable tie widely used in household,Construction industry,electronic industry,Auto,Cable and wire assemble
Package Includes:630pcs car clips;1pc plastic storage box;5pcs fastener Remover Tool;10pcs Cable Ties.Please check the clips’s size,type and shape to make sure the it is the one that you need,we offer worry-free 18months warranty and friendly customer service.
